sentences.sContent: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.sCn: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.sContent: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.sCn: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

synos.tran: 接待；接收；招待会；感受；反应

remMethod.val: 可能来自receive(v. 接待, 接见)

words.tran: 被一般承认的；被认为标准的
接受能力；[生理] 感受性
收到；接受；迎接（receive的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 招待会， 欢迎会； 接受， 接纳； 接待， 迎接； 接收效果
trans.tranOther: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc
